synopsis.text:
As a child, Phoron serenaded the night with a melody that reached the ears of Corticarte Apa Lagranges, a spirit who would become his lifelong companion. Fast forward to his teenage years, Phoron is now a student at the prestigious Tolvas Commandia Academy, where aspiring Dantists hone their skills to command spirits through the power of music. During a practice session, Pnorn's off-key attempt at a new melody unexpectedly summons Corticarte once again, binding them in a contract and sealing their fates together.

In this prequel to the previous season, the story unfolds at Commandia Academy, where Phoron and his friends navigate the complexities of controlling spirits and mastering the art of Commandia. At the heart of the tale are the four legendary 'Sousei Gakkis,' mystical instruments said to have created the world.

As Phoron grapples with his partnership with the volatile Corticarte, he discovers that his connection to her may be more significant than he ever imagined. With an ominous threat looming on the horizon, could this seemingly ordinary orphan be the key to averting impending doom? This new series intertwines with the events of Shinkyoku S≈çkai Polyphonica crimson S, offering a fresh perspective on the Academy years of the beloved storyline.
